Injustice:  "I see.  When do you want to do it?
Darkfate: "Right now"said the male"I can knock her out and fix her 
comlink to no work"
Injustice:  "Okay.  The first sign she's waking up I'm gone, I won't 
hang around to see her wake up.  She's dangerous."
Darkfate: "HEHEHEHEHE, I tough that you liked that she becomes your 
Girlfriend, Injsutice"said ironically the male
Injustice:  Very nervous now.  "Maybe I do...."
Darkfate: The male laughted more and said "first, If you like, you 
have to find the way to desapear the parrot... "
Injustice:  "No way, I'll get in trouble.  That's what you're trying 
to do!  Get me in trouble with Unicron!  Let's just go fix the 
femme's comm and move on, okay?!?"
Darkfate: "You're scared now, do you???"said the male and reply "But 
you're ok, let's go to work..."
Injustice:  "Fine, so you'll shut up about it."  He gets up and 
starts fr the computer lab.
Darkfate: the male arrrived at the room where Organics was, he 
slowly and carefully opened the door
Injustice:  Quietly sneaks in, and sees Organics is asleep.
Darkfate: Darkfate aimed and shot a dart that would knock her out.
Injustice:  "Can't be too careful  Come on, let's make this quick."
Darkfate: the male came in and checked if the dark hit Organics.
Injustic:  "Did it work?"
Darkfate: "It's seems "replied the male who took Organic's arms and 
started to jam her comlink and inserted the track device
Injustice:  "Make sure she does not have an internal com," the clone 
advised.
Organics:  The femme stirred a little, but did not wake up.
Darkfate: The male checked that she hadn a internal com, but  her 
stirred put him nervous, so he cheked again if the dart had hit her 
or not.
Injustice:  The clone almost ejected his fuel pump whn Organics 
moved.  He expected her top wake up and kill Darkfate, but didn't.  
He sighed, thinking this was not worth the stress.
Organics:  The femme stirred again, rolling on her back this time.
Darkfate: "It's done "whispered the male "Let's go... quietly" He 
left in silence the room
Injustice:  The clone tip toed out and held the door open for 
Darkfat, closing it quietly behind him.
Darkfate: "iLet's go out this zone " said the male walking camly
Injustice:  "I need another nap.  I have never been so stressed out 
in my life."
Darkfate: "what a shame" said the male "Be scared due a femme"
Injustice:  "I'm not scared!  Just a little more cautious than 
everyone else."
Darkfate: "do whatever you like, Injustice, our job it's done"
Injustice:  "Then if you need me, I'll be asleep in the med lab."  
Starts to walk toward the Med Lab.
Darkfate: The male cheked the time in a computer, it was time to 
feed the parrot again... But  could be good idea to send Organics 
again.... who would sent to tell her...OF course hers Baby sitter... 
Darkfate walked towards Nightstrike's room
Organics:  The femme rolled back onto the bed, still deep asleep due 
the tranquilizer.
Darkfate: The male walked towars Nightstrike's room and talked with 
him, he told to Nighstrike that the femme had to feed the parrot and 
his meal would be in 40 cycles, the time that would took the femme 
to woke up, also Nightstrike knew how prepare parrot's meal. 
Nightstrike was a gree and said that he would took care of all

40 cycles had passed.....

Nightstrike appeared in front of Organic's room and glenty he hit 
the door
Organics:  The femme slowly awakens, groaning as she sits up.  "Who 
is it?" she asks groggily.
Nightstrike:  "Nightstrike"said the male"It's time to feed your 
boyfried..."
Organics:  "Already?" she asks as she gets up and goes to the door.  
She opens it and leans on the door way, still half alseep.
Nightstrike: "It seems that you need sleep more"said coole the 
male"Your Boyfriend can wait"
Organics:  "No, I'm awake enough."  Reaches back and pulls th dart 
out of her back.  "What the slag is this?!?!"
Nightstrike: "Let's see"said the male taking carefully the dart with 
he free hand"Time to dutties, Organics, I'll take care of this and 
you have to care your boyfriend... Now take the dish and follow me" 
The male walked to Windlord's room after he left the dish to ORganics
Organics:  The valkyrie takes the dish and follows Night strike o 
Windlord's room.  "Windlord?  Are you awake?"
Nightstrike/Windlord:  Nightstrike opened the door and looking to 
Organics said "You just will have enought tinme to feed him and I'll 
come back to open you the door, you have 40 cycles, understend?"
Organics:  "Yeah, I understand."  She sits down next to Windlord, 
and holds the dish up.  "Time to eat."
Windlord: Windlord opened his eyes and weakly said "hi..." he tried 
to sit down but he couldn't move,  soon he stopped to try 
Organics:  She set the dish down and pulled Windlord up and held him 
close, sad that he was so weakened.
windlord: Windlor's eyes mirrowed sorrow,  he said  "I'm sorry that 
I couldn't help you to find the way to lef this place..."
Organics:  "Don't worry, we'll find a way.  Right now, you need to 
eat."
Windlord: "I'm not hungry"said Windlord while he low his head
 organics:  "You have to, you won't make it if you don't.  I won't 
let you die!  Now you're going to eat even if I have to force feed 
you!"
Windlord: Windlord weakly smiled and try to araise hi hand to took 
the spoon but he felt that his hand was heaviest, he stopped tried 
to rest a sec and keep trying
Organics:  "Sorry, I shouldn't have yelled at you."  She takes the 
spoon and fills it up, and begins to feed windlord.
Windlord: "I shouldn't have quit... I should keep fightting as 
warrior that I'm "said the male before eat the energon
Organics:  he femme nodded and continued to feed him the energon, 
dispite her sad way she handled things.
Windlord: the male stopped to eat, he had ended his food. He looked 
to Organics whie he took weakly her hands and said "You never had 
imagine that someday you would look me in this status..."
Organics:  She smiled weakly.  "Don't worry, it won't last long.  
just hang in there, for me..."
Windlord: The male said "Some how we should warn Malice... "
Organics:  "I'll try to find a way, but it will be hard, I can only 
use the scanners, I don't know if I can send him a signal from here."
Windlord: "Would very risky..."said the male"We have to find the 
way... or prepare our scape... Promise something my dear... would 
you do it"
Organics:  "I'll find a way.  Don' worry."
Windlord: "You'll  do"said weakly the male "But promised that if 
something happens me, you would scape in the firts chance..."
Organics:  "You'll be coming with me, so don't talk like we'll be 
seperated."
Windlord: "They can try to do it..."
Organics:  "Enugh.  You just rest, okay?  You'll feel better."
Windlord: the male nodded and relaxed. he took weakly Organic's 
hand, and closed his eyes
Organics:  The femme shut her optics down and took the time to rest 
in quiet.
Windlord: Windlord squezed weakly the femme's hand
